description:
As the day of the raid approaches, Law finds someone who might help him escape the prison and Kin’emon gathers up most of his main allies to discuss the raid plan. Meanwhile, at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a stunning declaration!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Alliance?! Kaido`s Army Gathers!
Arata na Doumei!? Kaidou Gun Dai Shuuketsu
Eine neue Allianz?! Kaidos Armee versammelt sich
Une nouvelle alliance ? Kaido rassemble ses troupes !
Новый альянс?! Армия Кайдо в сборе!
新たな同盟!? カイドウ軍大集結
